Contact

Contact Us

Questions about using Elastica? Please open a ticket on Github.

Elastic is developed and maintained by the MattiaLab at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. For more information on the projects we work on, see mattia-lab.com. If you are interested in collaborating with us, please contact Mattia Gazzola.

This website was created and maintained by Noel Naughton.
